desc: Yindi is an earth friendly skincare brand focusing on natural solutions to urban skin problems. Founded in the beautiful island of Penang, Malaysia by a Malaysian-Australian couple, Yindi's products are 100% vegan, natural, Australian formulated and made in Malaysia.

layout.text: Urbanite Blue Light Protection Hydrating Mist

Malaysia's 1'st Blue Light Protection Face Mist is a multi-protection facial mist, formulated with Organic Bulgarian Rose Water infused with Australian Kakadu Plum, Marine Algae, Hyaluronic Acid and clinically proven Blue Light Protection technology that hydrates and boosts your skin’s barrier against premature aging due to the harmful effects of blue light, UV damage and urban pollution
